title: Learning Trajectory (LT)-Based Instructional Design for Early Childhood Length Measurement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Early Childhood Development Stages and Basic Measurement Concepts
context.additional_context: A systematic course for current practitioners (childcare teachers, educational welfare officers, etc.) to deliver immediately applicable teaching methods in early childhood education

learning_goals: The step-by-step sequence of early childhood length measurement activities can be designed based on Learning Trajectory (LT) theory
Measurement activities can be selected and operationalized according to learners' developmental levels
Project-based assessments can be conducted using microlearning content in mobile environments

resources: Virtual simulation for early childhood measurement tools

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
